name: AirCavalry
0:
”Alexa, launch Air Cavalry”
”Alexa, ask Air Cavalry to attack”
”Alexa, ask Air Cavalry to stop”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: air cavalry
des:
Neighbor dogs barking all night? Crickets keeping you awake? Then it's time to call in the cavalry! Air Cavalry! Awaiting your orders, sir.

Air Cavalry! allows you to launch an imaginary chopper attack on your target of choice.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
